definition: to fool around/to mess with/to do sth without a plan
to do/to make/to go in for/to set up/to get hold of/to take care of

sentences.english: Stop monkeying about with the radio , or you'll break it.
sentences.chinese: 别把收音机拿来瞎搞，否则你会龙坏的。

sentences.english: "You'd better fucking not, " Dan's double said, and it was a real threat.
sentences.chinese: “你最好别瞎搞”，丹又想到，这是一个真正的威胁。

sentences.english: I thought the boss' decision to extend the working day was out of order.
sentences.chinese: 我认为老板增加工时的决定实在是胡搞瞎搞。

definition: to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
to mess around/to mess with something/to have an affair
to make a scene/to fool around/to behave foolishly
to fool around with/to mess with
to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
lit. to direct blindly/to issue confused orders/to give contradictory directions

pinyin: luan4 gao3 nan2 nu:3 guan1 xi4
